How do i apply the subs? Anyone got a good link for info on this? Cheers.

you can use VobSub to display the subtitles: http://www.divx-digest.com/software/vobsub.html
personal i use FFDSHOW (XviD, DivX, Ac3, Subtitles and many more - not a codec pack!).
just make sure that the filename of the movies and the subtitle are the same:
eks:
movie: "der untergang.avi"
subs: "der untergang.srt" or "der untergang.sub"
and make sure that the subs and the movie are in the same folder!
Thx!
